name: Polar Rush
description:
Polar Rush is a Rapid Prototype developed over a Period of 2 weeks, and then a further 4 weeks. The player has to make it to the end of multiple 3D Platforming Levels, jumping onto melting ice-floats,  wooden platforms, and attempting to swim with the heavy research gear on your backside.  At this point there are no plans to continue development.

Controls
WASD - Up, Down, Left, Right

Spacebar - Jump
